1b1('bum): bya / sheru gra/ 
1b2('bum): ste phrag
1b3('bum): brgya pa/ bamango so brgyad pa / 'gyur
1b4('bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
2a1('bum): 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem
2a2('bum): dpa' chen po myur du bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
2a3('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rnam pa med pa
2a4('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod
2b1('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
2b2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya
2b3('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod / ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub
2b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
2b5('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i
3a1('bum): / ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
3a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i bya chub tu mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya'o// 
3a3('bum): rab rib med pa zhes bya de po'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ da ting nge 'dzin des rnam
3a4('bum): per spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa
3a5('bum): yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// spyod pa dang / 
3a6('bum): ldan pa dang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin ngos rnam par spyod pa'i
3b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs bu'i byang chub
3b2('bum): t+yo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting
3b3('bum): nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa
3b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyu'o// yul las rgal ba
3b5('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin nges rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub semyos dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3b6('bum): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya'o// yon tan thams cad kyi
3b7('bum): tshigs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
4a1('bum): / dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sem
4a2('bum): med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo myur// 
4a3('bum): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal
4a4('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4a5('bum): myur du blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i
4a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag pa
4a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin
4b1('bum): des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mi mnyam pa dang ma
4b2('bum): pabazhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
4b3('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4b4('bum): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon/ rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// yongasu gcod pa byed pa zhes bya dpo'i ting 'dzin yod/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa byung
4b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ti
4b6('bum): 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o / 
4b7('bum): gnasu bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na mod pa yang drag par rdzogs pA
4b8('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
5a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes
5a2('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
5a3('bum): rdzogs pa rab tshang rgya'o// rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du
5a4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam
5a5('bum): par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
5a6('bum): rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
5a7('bum): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zheso bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam
5a8('bum): par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang
5b1('bum): bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
5b2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sgrol ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
5b3('bum): chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mtshan nyid yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ 
5b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sem das dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
5b5('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par dmig sa pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub
5b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rnam pa'i mchog thams
5b7('bum): cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang
5b8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
6a1('bum): yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
6a2('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub
6a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i
6a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
6a5('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// yang dag/ po dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge
6a6('bum): badzan des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
6a7('bum): 'gal ba dang 'gog po thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6a8('bum): chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'thun pa dang 'gayo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ 
6b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
6b2('bum): rgya'o// 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa
6b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'cha rgya'o// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod
6b4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
6b5('bum): zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de ting nge 'dzin des rnam pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
6b6('bum): po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de ting nge 'dzin
6b7('bum): des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rgyan
6b8('bum): chen po zhes bya ba'o ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
7a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rnam pa thams cad du 'ong byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin
7a2('bum): des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ting
7a3('bum): nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang
7a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs da par 'tshang rgya'o// rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
7a5('bum): 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7a6('bum): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par
7a7('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nyon mongs pa dang
7a8('bum): bcos pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
7b1('bum): dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
7b2('bum): 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
7b3('bum): par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
7b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag dpar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// lus kyi skyon
7b5('bum): yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
7b6('bum): po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jigs pas nam mkha' ltar gyur
7b7('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
7b8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
8a1('bum): yod de ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
8a2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
8a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
8a4('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ ting nge 'dzin dang // gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas byang nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
8a5('bum): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med/ grangs med pa gzhan dag
8a6('bum): kyang yod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
8a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gis rnam par spyod pa de ni sngon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
8a8('bum): kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin
8b1('bum): gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho slong baji srid cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
8b2('bum): chen po de blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes
8b3('bum): su mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do// / bdag ni snyoms par 'gyu 'o// bdag
8b4('bum): gis mnyam par bzhag par bya'o// bdag ni mnyadam par bzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med
8b5('bum): cing mi rgyu'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab rnga/ khyor ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub so// mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de bzhin
8b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
8b7('bum): ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan te/ byang chub sems dpa'
8b8('bum): yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid
9a1('bum): kyang ting nge 'dzin to// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med// 
9a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin kyang byang chub sems dpa'
9a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni
9a4('bum): ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
9a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do// smrasapa ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyu ra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i
9a6('bum): phyir ro// smras pa de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la
9a7('bum): rtog pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do// 'du shes su byed par 'gyur ba
9a8('bum): med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang
9b1('bum): med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa med do// 'du shes su 'gyur ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe// 
9b2('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la lags so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do// ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par
9b3('bum): spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
9b4('bum): par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab bar bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab pa ru bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// 
9b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bslab/ par bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par// bya'o// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bslab par
9b6('bum): bya'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dbang po rnams la bslab par bya'o// stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o// byang chub
9b7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan rnams la
9b8('bum): bslab par bya'o// tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// 
10a1('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la
10a2('bum): bslab par bya'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs// 
10a3('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// byams pa chen po la
10a4('bum): bslab par bya'o// snying rje chen po lo bslab par bya'o// 8/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 
10a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sa/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
10a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slo'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
10a7('bum): gyis slobo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slo'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slo'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
10a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slo'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
10b1('bum): la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slog/ dbang po rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma/ 
10b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
10b3('bum): slob bo// bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
10b4('bum): rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// rnam da par thar pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
10b5('bum): pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i
10b6('bum): tshul gyis slob bo// mngon par shes pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// gzungs kyi
10b7('bum): sgornams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// mi 'jigs pa rnams la
10b8('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa
11a1('bum): tshul gyis slob bo// snying rje chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob
11a2('bum): do/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bkal stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
11a3('bum): nga'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i
11a4('bum): tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin// pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i
11a5('bum): tshul gyis slob pa yin/ smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
11a6('bum): slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ dbang po rnams
11a7('bum): la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa
11a8('bum): yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin// 
11b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ tshad med pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
11b2('bum): la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi
11b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mngon par shes
11b4('bum): pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi dmigs pa'i// 
11b5('bum): tshul gyis slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob
11b6('bum): pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la mi dmigs
11b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi// 
11b8('bum): dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag mi dmigs so// sems can mi dmigs so// 'gro ba mi
12a1('bum): dmigs so// gso ba mi dmigs so// skyes du mi dmigs so// gang zag mi dmigs so// shed can mi dmigs so// shed bdag mi dmigs so// 
12a2('bum): byed pa po mi dmigs so// tshor ba po mi dmigs so// shes pa po mi dmigs so// mthong ba po mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir// gzugs mi dmig so// 
12a3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba po mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du shes mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'du byed mi dmigs so// shin
12a4('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs daso// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig mi dmig/ so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba mi dmigaso// 
12a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus mi dmigs so// shin/ 
12a6('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag
12a7('bum): pa'i phyir dri mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rig mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos mi dmig
12a8('bum): sos/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig gi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mig
12b1('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i khams mi dmyigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sgra'i khams mi dmigs so// shin/ 
12b2('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dri'i kham
12b3('bum): mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lce'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par
12b4('bum): dag pa'i phyir ro'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam ra par dag pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi
12b5('bum): khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i// phyir reg gi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes po'i khams mi
12b6('bum): dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yid kyi
12b7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chu'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam
12b8('bum): par dag pa'i phyir me'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rlung gi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir na mkha'i khams mi dmigs so// 
13a1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma rig pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dra/ 
13a2('bum): byed mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
13a3('bum): skye mched drug mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir reg pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshor ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sred pa mi
13a4('bum): dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir len pa ming mi dgas so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir srid pa mid mi dgas so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye ba mi dmigs so// 
13a5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rga shi mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba mi dmigs so// 
13a6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gog pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par
13a7('bum): dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi
13a8('bum): dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par
13b1('bum): dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab
13b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so// / 
13b3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dbang po rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams mi
13b4('bum): dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi ya na lag rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so// 
13b5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam/ sa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par
13b6('bum): dag pa'i phyir tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
13b7('bum): phyir rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
13b8('bum): phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmig so// / 
14a1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag
14a2('bum): pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang
14a3('bum): dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byams pa chen po mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po mi dmigs so// shin tu
14a4('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nga mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyu dan du zhugs po mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
14a5('bum): phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa mi dmig so
14a6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmig so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so// / 
14a7('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma
14a8('bum): skyes pa dang / mi 'gag po dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa
14b1('bum): 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// gsol pa/ 
14b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
14b3('bum): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang slob pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i spyi bos/ ji ltar mngon par
14b4('bum): chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rna dam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
14b5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mchis pa ma
14b6('bum): lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
14b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog
14b8('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhini stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa
15a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngam nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor
15a2('bum): nga nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 
15a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
15a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / da mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa s+ho// nga ba nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po mod
15a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
15a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
15a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
15a8('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
15b1('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
15b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
15b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// 
15b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong po nyid dang / don dam pa skyed
15b5('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid// dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med
15b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
15b7('bum): dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang
15b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 
16a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
16a2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba nang
16a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
16a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi dad dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / do/ rab med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / 
16a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
16a6('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sna nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 
16a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
16a8('bum): nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
16b1('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA radwa ti'i bu lce nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyim stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen/ 
16b2('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
16b3('bum): dror ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
16b4('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngonyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu lus nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
16b5('bum): pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyi da dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas s+ho/ nga pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
16b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
16b7('bum): dang / mi dmigs stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu yid nang stong
16b8('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas
17a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
17a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
17a3('bum): nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
17a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa de nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba

17a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sgra nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang
17a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las

17b2('bum): ti'i bu dri nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /

27b8('bum): pastong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med kyi man rlo kyi kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA radwa ti'i bu dbang po rnams nang stong pa/

28a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
28a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos de med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi
28a4('bum): kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu stobs rnams na stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyi da dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 
28a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa/ stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
28a6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
28a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
28a8('bum): dang nga stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / theg
28b1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/ 
28b2('bum): dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu lam nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
28b3('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
28b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyi du dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong da pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
28b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / da/ ngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa
28b6('bum): ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
28b7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
28b8('bum): dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
29a1('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
29a2('bum): dadang chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor
29a3('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
29a4('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa/ dam yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshad med pa rnams nang stong pa nyi/ dad dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
29a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma
29a6('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
29a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nang
29a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma
29b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi/ 
29b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA rang
29b3('bum): ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid
29b4('bum): dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dador ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / 
29b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
29b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa dgu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
29b7('bum): dang rnga chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
29b8('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
30a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA radwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nang
30a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 
30a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
30a4('bum): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa/ 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA radwa ti'i
30a5('bum): bu mngon par shes pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 
30a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / 
30a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
30a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa
30b1('bum): nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
30b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo
30b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / 
30b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
30b5('bum): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang // chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
30b6('bum): pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
30b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
30b8('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dorang med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
31a1('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
31a2('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mi 'jigs pa bzhi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po/ 
31a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
31a4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid s+ho/ dang pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
31a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi nang stong pa
31a6('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
31a7('bum): nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang
31a8('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma
31b1('bum): yin no// shA radra ti'i bu snying rje chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dug/ chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid
31b2('bum): dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
31b3('bum): rang bzhin spyong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
31b4('bum): dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yodapa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'a dadres pa bco brgyad nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / 
31b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'du sa byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 
31b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
31b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa
31b8('bum): so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/ sred pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongasu brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste chad pa dang / rtag pa'i
32a1('bum): mtha' la chags pas de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yong su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
32a2('bum): mngon par zhen to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// bsam
32a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi nang stong pa nyid la
32a4('bum): mngon par zhen to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par na/ don to// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// don dam dpa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
32a5('bum): la mngon par zhen to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon pa ra zhen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon
32a6('bum): par zhen to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon
32a7('bum): par zhen to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
32a8('bum): la mngon par zhen to// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// dbang po rnams la
32b1('bum): mngon par zhen to// stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i bden pa
32b2('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen to// tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// rnam
32b3('bum): par thar pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen to// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan me med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen to// 
32b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// ting nge 'chi ngan rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mdo ngan par zhen to// snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin
32b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// mi 'ardzi/ gas pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// sangs rgyas kyi
32b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo // ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ 
32b7('bum): gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du shes mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig mi shes mi mthong ngo // / 
32b8('bum): rna ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // sgra mi shes mi mthong ngo // dri mi
33a1('bum): shes mi mthong ngo // ro mi shes mi mthong ngo // reg mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes
33a2('bum): pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi
33a3('bum): shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
33a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg
33a5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te re/ ga pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
33a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshul khrims
33a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
33a8('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong // phyi stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
33b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus ma
33b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi shos mi mthong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi shes
33b3('bum): mi mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi
33b4('bum): shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi ma thong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngo sa po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
33b5('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // yang dag / par spong ba bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rka/  pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // dbang po lnga mi shes mi
33b6('bum): mthong ngo // stobs lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam
33b7('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshad med pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par thar pa
33b8('bum): brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo // stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
34a1('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzus kyi sgo rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // byams pa chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo / 
34a2('bum): snying rje chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi shes mi mthong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi
34a3('bum): mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grang su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas 'byung ba ma yin
34a4('bum): zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzu dgas kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos kyi sa nas
34a5('bum): 'byung ba ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji lta yid mi ches she na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid
34a6('bum): mi ches so// tshor ba tshor bas skyong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par
34a7('bum): shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig mig gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba rna bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna snas stong zhes bya bar yid mi
34a8('bum): ches so// lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar
34b1('bum): yid mi ches so// sla smras stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ro ros stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// reg reg gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chos
34b2('bum): chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya
34b3('bum): bar yid mi ches so// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi
34b4('bum): rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam pa ru shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus
34b5('bum): te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid/ mi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te re/ ga pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i 'dus te
34b6('bum): reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong bya bar yid mi chos so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong
34b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
34b8('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid miches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i
35a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
35a2('bum): tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
35a3('bum): gyis tshor ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshul
35a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyingan pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bzod pa'i pha pharol tu phyin pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya
35a5('bum): bar yid mi ches so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar/ yid mi ches so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam
35a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa
35a7('bum): nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// stong
35a8('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa
35b1('bum): nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya
35b2('bum): par yid mi ches so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
35b3('bum): pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya
35b4('bum): par yid mi ches so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// @ gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong/ 
35b5('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi che/ sa so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa
35b6('bum): nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngo po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhes
35b7('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong
35b8('bum): zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 
36a1('bum): stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'phags pa'i
36a2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid
36a3('bum): mi ches so// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzugs med
36a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyomangs par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi che/ ngas so// rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad
36a5('bum): kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa/ 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
36a6('bum): song/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong zhes bya bar
36a7('bum): yid mi ches so// mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi
36a8('bum): ches so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar
36b1('bum): yid mi ches so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 
36b2('bum): byams pa chen po byams pa chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid mi mchis so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid mi mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sangs rgyas kyi
36b3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
36b4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom
36b5('bum): pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// la ma gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis
36b6('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mchis so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas
36b7('bum): pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus
36b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma
37a1('bum): yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ don dam/ 
37a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ thog
37a3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma
37a4('bum): yin rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin// da mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po me/ dad pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
37a5('bum): nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la/ gnas pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la
37a6('bum): gnas pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ stobs rnams la gnas pa
37a7('bum): ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam
37a8('bum): gtan rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas pa ma
37b1('bum): yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu le gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med da dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mngon par
37b2('bum): shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs
37b3('bum): pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ 
37b4('bum): rnams la gnas pa ma yino// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs de la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen
37b5('bum): pa yin/ 'du shes la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la/ mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon pa/ ra zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna
37b6('bum): ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs la mngon
37b7('bum): par zhen pa yin/ sgra la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos la mngon par zhen pa yin// 
37b8('bum): mig gi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i khams la mngon
38a1('bum): par zhen pa yin/ sgra'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri'i
38a2('bum): khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i rnam
38a3('bum): par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg bya'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par
38a4('bum): zhen pa yin/ yid kyi khams la mngon nan pa yin/ chos kyi kha mas la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags la
38a5('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ zhe sdang la mngon par zhen pa yin// gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta ba'i rnam pa/ la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ma rig pa la mngon par
38a6('bum): zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched drug la mngon par zhen pa
38a7('bum): yin reg pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sred pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ len pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ srid pa la mngon par zhen pa
38a8('bum): yin skye ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rga shi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par
38b1('bum): zhen pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin// 
38b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stong
38b3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa
38b4('bum): yin 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yi ma/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
38b5('bum): pa yin/  dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen payin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par na/ na pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par
38b6('bum): zhen pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yi ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin// 
38b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yang dag
38b8('bum): par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stobs rnams la mngon par zhen pa
39a1('bum): yin byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
39a2('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
39a3('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar
39a4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smond pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mngon par she rjes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin
39a5('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'i stobs bcu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi 'jigs
39a6('bum): pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig po bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen pa
39a7('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa
39a8('bum): yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
39b1('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa
39b2('bum): zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ 
39b3('bum): mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ 
39b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol
