39b5('bum): tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ khyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub
39b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon
39b7('bum): par zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
39b8('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyin/ 
40a1('bum): stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
40a2('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
40a3('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags
40a4('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ban+tadags shing mngon par zhen/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi dmigs pa stong pa
40a5('bum): nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa nga pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ ngo bo nyid ni/ nga ba nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ dngos po med pa
40a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu
40a7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
40a8('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtu
40b1('bum): rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa
40b2('bum): brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 
40b3('bum): smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
40b4('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi 'dzi gas pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ so so yang
40b5('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ byams pa chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ sangs rgyas
40b6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par
40b7('bum): zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40b8('bum): phyin pa la slob pa ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
41a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
41a2('bum): sprul pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
41a3('bum): mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba
41a4('bum): yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe dbasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang
41a5('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
41a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
41a7('bum): de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
41a8('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub snams dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
41b1('bum): phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
41b2('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
41b3('bum): phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
41b4('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyi na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha
41b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su/ mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'o// sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
41b6('bum): slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi bcu pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i
41b7('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
41b8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
42a1('bum): chen po phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjesu mi mithong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ 
42a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i
42a3('bum): tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul
42a4('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyi du stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
42a5('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chu/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
42a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag
42a7('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
42a8('bum): du 'byung ngo // shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA rang
42b1('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar chu ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA radwa ti'i nga byang chub sems
42b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
42b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas
42b4('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de ming mi dgas shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
42b5('bum): tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshulagyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
42b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
42b7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog
42b8('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
43a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA radwa ti'i byabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med
43a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
43a3('bum): la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
43a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su nga mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni
43a5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
43a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi
43a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan
43a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmig
43b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
43b2('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
43b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa ma stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing
43b4('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
43b5('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa du 'byung ngo // radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
43b6('bum): de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
43b7('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i
43b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de lta slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa
44a1('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i
44a2('bum): tshed dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob
44a3('bum): pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang
44a4('bum): dag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su da mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
44a5('bum): slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams ca da mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
44a6('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44a7('bum): phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la
44a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
44b1('bum): slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs de dag mi
44b2('bum): dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
44b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag la
44b4('bum): mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ dan po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ 
44b5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
44b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
44b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
44b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
45a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
45a2('bum): chen po bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
45a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams
45a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang de dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
45a5('bum): phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
45a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
45a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
45a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
45b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
45b2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 
45b3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // 
45b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i
45b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de ngag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
45b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
45b7('bum): po mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
45b8('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
46a1('bum): chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
46a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
46a3('bum): chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
46a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs dpa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
46a5('bum): / chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
46a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
46a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
46a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
46b1('bum): dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
46b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
46b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe byams pa chen po de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
46b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs patshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
46b5('bum): snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
46b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas
46b7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
46b8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
47a1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe thams cad shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
47a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi
47a3('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
47a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'itshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
47a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
47a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
47a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
47a8('bum): 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa
47b1('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa
47b2('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 
47b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa
47b4('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong / pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
47b5('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmi gas pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
47b6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u drug pa'o// / 
47b7('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
47b8('bum): lA bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji/ 
48a1('bum): skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skye bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad
48a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom
48a3('bum): ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
48a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du ba// snyan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad
48a5('bum): du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
48a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i
48a7('bum): skyes bu 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mtshon/ 
48a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa
48b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ 
48b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
48b3('bum): pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dridra bde la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhog 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di
48b4('bum): stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ngapa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'ad
48b5('bum): de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom lda na 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i sgra/ sa bu 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams
48b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ 
48b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
48b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dra zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu
49a1('bum): 'dri chen po stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi/ 
49a2('bum): na bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam
49a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// 
49a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 
49a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes ma che na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
49a6('bum): skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
49a7('bum): 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mtha' las 'das/ 
49a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad
49b1('bum): / du'adri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
49b2('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
49b3('bum): skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
49b4('bum): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dra ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la da la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rang bzhin
49b5('bum): stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad ma/ khyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchi na/ bcom
49b6('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa
49b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi
49b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa
50a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri
50a2('bum): zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes
50a3('bum): mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / 
50a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ darnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ ma zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji
50a5('bum): skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
50a6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig
50a7('bum): 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
50a8('bum): pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la lo zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dran
50b1('bum): banye bar bzhag pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan
50b2('bum): 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
50b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ 
50b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma de'i skyes bu 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsla deb shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba
50b5('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thopar 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom
50b6('bum): ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dbang po rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad malce
50b7('bum): pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di stobs
50b8('bum): rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri
51a1('bum): bde la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
51a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan
51a3('bum): 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa
51a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bsta ngan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du
51a5('bum): 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam sa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
51a6('bum): thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam
51a7('bum): gtan rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mtsho na/ bcom ldan 'das de
51a8('bum): skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di tshad med pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyi
51b1('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la
51b2('bum): zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
51b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu/ 
51b4('bum): 'di rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslabs shing / rnam pa tham ngas cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi
51b5('bum): na bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bsta/ na bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mthar kyis gnas pa'i
51b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom
51b7('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
51b8('bum): dang / smon pa med pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom
52a1('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mngon par shes pa rnams la bslabs/ 
52a2('bum): shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
52a3('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
52a4('bum): ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ dar ma zhes mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri dbade la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la
52a5('bum): la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
52a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di de
52a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom
52a8('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'dadi skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
52b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan
52b2('bum): 'das lnga la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
52b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri bde la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes
52b4('bum): bu 'di snying rje chen po la bslabs shing / rnam pa thamadas cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi
52b5('bum): na bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bsta na par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
52b6('bum): rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la
52b7('bum): ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji// 
52b8('bum): ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
53a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag/ 
53a2('bum): so bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
53a3('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
53a4('bum): 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par she ngas pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ 
53a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
53a6('bum): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ 
53a7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol/ 
53a8('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems lce yang gzhan sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
53b1('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
53b2('bum): so/ 'a bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
53b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
53b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra yang gzha dan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
53b5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

53b7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ reg kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
53b8('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
54a1('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

54b4('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
54b5('bum): pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gas la pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// brtse/ ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
54b6('bum): sems/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
54b7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// /

56a7('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/

56b2('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

56b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

57a1('bum): de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gso
57a2('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam

57a5('bum): gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gso la pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
57a6('bum): sems/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 
57a7('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
57a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom
57b1('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dor ba med de stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ 
57b2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
57b3('bum): yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la
57b4('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ ba com ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'a// ngas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
57b5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
57b6('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
57b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// 
57b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag/ 
58a1('bum): so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ 
58a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang
58a3('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
58a4('bum): kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gso la pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom nga ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
58a5('bum): sems/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcoM ma ldan 'das de lta ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
58a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
58a7('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
58a8('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
58b1('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa
58b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin ste/ 
58b3('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
58b4('bum): yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags ra so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dri ji snyam du sems/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma ya/ 
58b5('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ 'a stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs med
58b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhon zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
58b7('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
58b8('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
59a1('bum): de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
59a2('bum): pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mngon par
59a3('bum): shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// 
59a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta/ de ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
59a5('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcoM ma ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

59a7('bum): sos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ 
59a8('bum): de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ 
59b1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/

59b3('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la
59b4('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bco ma ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// // / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po
59b5('bum): zhe gcig pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan/ ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzu/ gas nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom
59b6('bum): ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dus shes kyang / gzhan ma lags
59b7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed
59b8('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma
60a1('bum): nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go// bcom

60b1('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/

60b5('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa
60b6('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa
60b7('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa
60b8('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
61a1('bum): yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sbrum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom
61a2('bum): ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i
61a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
61a4('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ da lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus
61a5('bum): te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
61a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg
61a7('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang
61a8('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus
61b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sbrum/

61b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
61b6('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
61b7('bum): chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang
61b8('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
62a1('bum): rlung gi khams so// bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ na mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
62a2('bum): nam mkha'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sbrum
62a3('bum): nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 
62a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang
62a5('bum): gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa ra shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan
62a6('bum): ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang
62a7('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug/ bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma
62a8('bum): nyid kyang reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang
62b1('bum): gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o// bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan
62b2('bum): pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom
62b3('bum): ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
62b4('bum): lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o// / bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang / gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin
62b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa 'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khri mas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang
62b6('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma
62b7('bum): lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
62b8('bum): yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam
63a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / 
63a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
63a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang
63a4('bum): gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid// bcom lda ngan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma
63a5('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das s+ho/ nga pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang / 
63a6('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
63a7('bum): te chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa
63a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
63b1('bum): kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu
63b2('bum): ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sbyi ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
63b3('bum): sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid// bcos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyum
63b4('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom dang ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lag das sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa
63b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzha na mi lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang
63b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams
63b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang
63b8('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
64a1('bum): lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong nga nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma
64a2('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang
64a3('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang
64a4('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar bzhag
64a5('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lag/ sa te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so// bcom ldan
64a6('bum): 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan
64a7('bum): 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan
64a8('bum): 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan
64b1('bum): ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang
64b2('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan
64b3('bum): ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
64b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu/ ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa
64b5('bum): rnams so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams nga gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan
64b6('bum): rnams so// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan
64b7('bum): 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs
64b8('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang
65a1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar gyis
65a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
65a3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan ma legs/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
65a4('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / da mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad ngas mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
65a5('bum): ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma
65a6('bum): lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ting 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
65a7('bum): lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
65a8('bum): lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma
65b1('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang
65b2('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang / 
65b3('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan
65b4('bum): ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ 
65b5('bum): yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kya rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das
65b6('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'o/ 
65b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
65b8('bum): bu'o' bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu mo nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// bcom
66a1('bum): ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub po// bcom ldan 'das
66a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// bcom
66a3('bum): ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams
66a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis padaka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol
66a5('bum): par bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs
66a6('bum): pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la
66a7('bum): skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
66a8('bum): nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
66b1('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes dang brda' dang gdags pa dang tha snyad du/ 
66b2('bum): bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shi ba dang brda' dang gdags
66b3('bum): pa dang tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam pa byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ 
66b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan pa dadus kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du se mas/ gang la 'du shes med cing / brda' med pa
66b5('bum): dang gdags pa med pa dang tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus/ med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag
66b6('bum): med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam
66b7('bum): par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
66b8('bum): ram gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
67a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// 
67a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sgyu/ 
67a3('bum): ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de
67a4('bum): nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go// bcom lda ngan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
67a5('bum): phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
67a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmi gsum mchig bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
67a7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
67a8('bum): ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis
67b1('bum): pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
67b2('bum): bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di
67b3('bum): ltar sgyu na ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigasu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
67b4('bum): snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
67b5('bum): ra mar gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos
67b6('bum): po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigasu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes
67b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 
67b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
68a1('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
68a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ 
68a3('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag
68a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ramagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// 
68a5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar smigargyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigasu ma mchi so// / 
68a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
68a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis
68a8('bum): pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigasu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni
68b1('bum): rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// 
68b2('bum): de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 
68b3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
68b4('bum): dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi
68b5('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi / migs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
68b6('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 
68b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tsher ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 
68b8('bum): rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi
69a1('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 
69a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
69a3('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
69a4('bum): dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi dar mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
69a5('bum): mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dam gas so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
69a6('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan
69a7('bum): lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang
