69a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigaso// 
69b1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med
69b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
69b3('bum): dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo
69b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i dngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab ba byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu/ tshor ba ni mig yor lta
69b5('bum): bu 'du shes ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni mig yor lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rna/ ma par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni
69b6('bum): phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
69b7('bum): mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
69b8('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmis
70a1('bum): so/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi
70a2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
70a3('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du shes ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du byed ni chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes
70a4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// ded dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi ste dang pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
70a5('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmi gus so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus
70a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa
70a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 
70a8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
70b1('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du byed
70b2('bum): ni smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir
70b3('bum): mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig so// / 
70b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang
70b5('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhi na stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad
70b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
70b7('bum): mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba ni sprul pa/ 
70b8('bum): lta bu 'du shes ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed ni sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// ded
71a1('bum): ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig
71a2('bum): so/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
71a3('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
71a4('bum): mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir ming mi dgas so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
71a5('bum): dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
71a6('bum): dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
71a7('bum): po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
71a8('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i
71b1('bum): bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di
71b2('bum): thos na/ mi 'jigs mi sdang mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
71b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mi rtag ces
71b4('bum): bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// / 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs
71b5('bum): saung 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi/ dmigs so// rnam par shes pa mi rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa
71b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
71b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal ni smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du shes ni smig rgyu
71b8('bum): lta bu/ 'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
72a1('bum): so/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir
72a2('bum): mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das
72a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang zhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
72a4('bum): dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyird mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
72a5('bum): dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ming mi gas so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
72a6('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos
72a7('bum): nas/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par ni 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
72a8('bum): po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs
72b1('bum): shing snga ma dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi sdang mi skrag pa'i
72b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po shes
72b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba mi rtag ces
72b4('bum): bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byorading ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nga sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
72b5('bum): pa'o/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang / 'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
72b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du shes
72b7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de
72b8('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
73a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs
73a2('bum): bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 
73a3('bum): 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
73a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
73a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du rta da dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs zhi ba zhes bya
73a6('bum): bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba zhi pa zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byed zhing zhes bya bar
73a7('bum): rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa zhi ba zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
73a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
73b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar
73b2('bum): rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
73b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byad stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa stong
73b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byo dar 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas
73b5('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang / 'asams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
73b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mtshan ma
73b7('bum): med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigaso// / 
73b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
74a1('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
74a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
74a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa mdado ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
74a4('bum): sems kyis/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes smon
74a5('bum): pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar rtog
74a6('bum): skye/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
74a7('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
74a8('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de
74b1('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
74b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed
74b3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
74b4('bum): bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ 
74b5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'o chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
74b6('bum): gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam
74b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems 'du byed
74b8('bum): dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// / 
75a1('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
75a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed
75a3('bum): de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
75a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ dad mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
75a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
75a6('bum): bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
75a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
75a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
75b1('bum): yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug
75b2('bum): bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par
75b3('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigaso// 
75b4('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
75b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med
75b6('bum): pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par
75b7('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med pa'i rna ba rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// 
75b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
76a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
76a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
76a3('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
76a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor bzhi pa'i rnam par rto// gas par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 
76a5('bum): 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de ming mi gas so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par
76a6('bum): rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs
76a7('bum): so rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
76a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par
76b1('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
76b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
76b3('bum): 'du byed stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par
76b4('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab
76b5('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che nu po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
76b6('bum): bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan
76b7('bum): ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs
76b8('bum): par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmig so// / 
77a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di
77a2('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
77a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam
77a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
77a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ da mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 
77a6('bum): 'du byed smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa nyid smon pa med pa'i rnam
77a7('bum): par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
77a8('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par
77b1('bum): 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
77b2('bum): rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya das/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs
77b3('bum): par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de
77b4('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang da ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mdo dran par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de// 
77b5('bum): de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems pa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor
77b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 
77b7('bum): gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtogs
77b8('bum): par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
78a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
78a2('bum): yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
78a3('bum): ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po zhe gnyis pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
78a4('bum): rtogs pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams ca dad lo gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes
78a5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 5thugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de
78a6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos bstan to// gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
78a7('bum): chos bstan to// gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
78a8('bum): bstan to// gzugs dben zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tsher ba sdug bsngal/ 
78b1('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
78b2('bum): bstan to// tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba smon pa med ces bya
78b3('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
78b4('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
78b5('bum): chos bstan to// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes zhi// zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 
78b6('bum): 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes smon pa med ces bya
78b7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi
78b8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
79a1('bum): chos bstan to// 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 
79a2('bum): 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de
79a3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
79a4('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba ra de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
79a5('bum): gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
79a6('bum): chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes po mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
79a7('bum): bstan to// rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
79a8('bum): gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
79b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
79b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
79b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de// mi dmig
79b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sa ngas rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzug das gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
79b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos pa nga rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pa sa/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
79b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
79b7('bum): gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
79b8('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
80a1('bum): byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmig/ 
80a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
80a3('bum): gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
80a4('bum): la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la/ bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang sdug bsngal/ dba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
80a5('bum): gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshore ba gang ba dag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs// 
80a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
80a7('bum): byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos pa
80a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang
80b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
80b2('bum): la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
80b3('bum): yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tsher ba gang dben po'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang / 
80b4('bum): mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
80b5('bum): ldan pas/ 'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid/ la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya/ da do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya
80b6('bum): dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi// 
80b7('bum): ldan pas/ 'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas// 
80b8('bum): 'du shes gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mtshan
81a1('bum): ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang smon
81a2('bum): pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldon pas/ 'du shes gang mngon par 'du
81a3('bum): bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang dben pa'i
81a4('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yi du la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mi rtag pa'i
81a5('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas/ kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas// 'du byed gang sdug
81a6('bum): bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yi de la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i
81a7('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang ni de'i rnam par yid la byed pa
81a8('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
81b1('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
81b2('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
81b3('bum): byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
81b4('bum): la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba da dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed/ 
81b5('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang rmi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yod
81b6('bum): la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
81b7('bum): la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
81b8('bum): la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya'o// 
82a1('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang stod pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
82a2('bum): la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 
82a3('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid lo byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
82a4('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
82a5('bum): gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par na/ sa pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
82a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor 'dri na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas bya
82a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
82a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam par
82b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang mos pa 'di ni
82b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// 
82b3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
82b4('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rabatu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes/ 
82b5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dkar de ces bya bar de mi
82b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// 
82b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
82b8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 
83a1('bum): gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'a
83a2('bum): bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
83a3('bum): rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
83a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ra de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa tha dmas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tsher
83a5('bum): ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi
83a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// 
83a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
83a8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba
83b1('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
83b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
83b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
83b4('bum): bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmig nges pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhin
83b5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
83b6('bum): tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam
83b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
83b8('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// 
84a1('bum): 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
84a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog
84a3('bum): go rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
84a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya ba/ dar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
84a5('bum): bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshu la gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med
84a6('bum): ces bya bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul
84a7('bum): gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// 
84a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
84b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par she pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes
84b2('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
84b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams
84b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam parades pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyisar rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
84b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
84b6('bum): bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa
84b7('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs/ 
84b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
85a1('bum): chen po de'i brjon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byung
85a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
85a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa/ byang chub kyi dgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed
85a4('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// 
85a5('bum): gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis / ga cing / nyan thos dong rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/ 'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa/ 
85a6('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
85a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 
85a8('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa/ byang chub kyi 'gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
85b1('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
85b2('bum): ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi 'gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
85b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byang
85b4('bum): dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba ga na na gyi ge mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sam/ das dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
85b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
85b6('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
85b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
85b8('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
86a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
86a2('bum): gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi ge mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
86a4('bum): rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ljon pa'i yi dad la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi dgagasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
86a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag
86a6('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi 'geg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma
86a7('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ cho
86a8('bum): bsdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba
86b1('bum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 
86b2('bum): tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur/ 
86b3('bum): bgazhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
86b4('bum): byangs/ tshor ba ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang lnga na pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge bde ma yin pa byang
86b5('bum): chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
86b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi
86b7('bum): dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi ge mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
86b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
87a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi 'geg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
87a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan
87a3('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
87a4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ danam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de// 
87a5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi
87a6('bum): go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos
87a7('bum): ba dben zhes bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur
87a8('bum): ba gzhan gyi gau mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/ 
87b1('bum): la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
87b2('bum): bgegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang // 
87b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dag bdam
87b4('bum): yin pa byang chub kyi bges su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi/ ge mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
87b5('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
87b6('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge pa de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
87b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
87b8('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge pa de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgagasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
88a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
88a2('bum): gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgag su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
88a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
88a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa/ byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba
88a5('bum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
88a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 
88a7('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
88a8('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
88b1('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi dgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
88b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos
88b3('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
88b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
88b5('bum): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas du ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa
88b6('bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed// 
88b7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa bya dang kyi'ageg su 'gyur
88b8('bum): gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
89a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma
89a2('bum): yin pa byang chub kyi 'gegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
89a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 
89a4('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgag su 'gyur ba ga/ zhon gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
89a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lda na ba'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos da
89a6('bum): rod sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis go ma 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
89a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
89a8('bum): gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi 'geg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
89b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
89b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
89b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pIH/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba
89b4('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / da nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya dab dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su
89b5('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
89b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sang+yas dang ljon pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma
89b7('bum): yin pa byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi ge mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
89b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang
90a1('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
90a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
90a3('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
90a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba das/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
90a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgya sa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi
90a6('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
90a7('bum): rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
90a8('bum): bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
90b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge/ 
90b2('bum): ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgag su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam
90b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dong rang sangs rgyas dang
90b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa bya / rab kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
90b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ ma par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
90b6('bum): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgregasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / 
90b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam
90b8('bum): par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de
91a1('bum): ma yin pa byang chub kyi dgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
91a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang
91a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi 'geg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
91a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan
91a5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ namar+tha/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
91a6('bum): bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong
91a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes nyid kyang
91a8('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par
91b1('bum): shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis/ mig stong pa
91b2('bum): ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sku'i stong
91b3('bum): pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// 
91b4('bum): lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lu sa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang luso// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi yid nyid
91b5('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzug sa kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs stong pa ma yin/ gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzug
91b6('bum): sosgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong
91b7('bum): pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid kyang
91b8('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa
92a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam pa
92a2('bum): shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par
92a3('bum): shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
92a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lha'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes
92a5('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 
92a6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 
92a7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// / 
92a8('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te ga pa sto pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i
92b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg
92b2('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
92b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg
92b4('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa'i dad do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi/ 
92b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong/ pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
92b6('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
92b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
92b8('bum): ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kya
93a1('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa
93a2('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus
93a3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
93a4('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'a dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid
93a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin/ gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te/ 
93a6('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i
93a7('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyis/ chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ me'i
93a8('bum): khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin gyi// 
93b1('bum): rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ na mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ na mkha'i khams nyid kyang
93b2('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i
93b3('bum): khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang
93b4('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 2du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// s+ho/ 
93b5('bum): pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
93b6('bum): nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ming dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
93b7('bum): ming dang gzugaso// skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis/ skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drugo/ rigs
93b8('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba
94a1('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred pa
94a2('bum): len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ len pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang
94a3('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rga shi stong
94a4('bum): pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyi da kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi// 
94a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stongapa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khri/ mas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi
94a6('bum): pha rol phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa
94a7('bum): nyid kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi
94a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang brtson
94b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
94b2('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi// 
94b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ nang
94b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
94b5('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong / pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ste/ da pa ma yin gyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
94b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang phyinang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
94b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid stong ma yin gyi/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// 
94b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 8
95a1('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus
95a2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// 
95a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong ma yin gyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
95a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma/ med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ thog ma
95a5('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyi da kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// de ra ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dor ba me/ 
95a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang bzhin
95a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos tham
95a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
95b1('bum): kyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa
95b2('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa
95b3('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa
95b4('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin/ g+hi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i
95b5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// 
95b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhan/ 
95b7('bum): panyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ yang
95b8('bum): dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/
