96a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po
96a2('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams
96a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag
96a4('bum): rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan la/ dag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i
96a5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ste nga pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid
96a6('bum): kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsams tan gyi
96a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 
96a8('bum): tshad med pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid
96b1('bum): kyis/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
96b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
96b3('bum): nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin/ 
96b4('bum): gyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam
96b5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
96b6('bum): pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste
96b7('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong
96b8('bum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
97a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzus kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
97a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang
97a3('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong
97a4('bum): ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so
97a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyi// da kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// sti/ de rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis/ snying rje chen po stong pa
97a6('bum): ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
97a7('bum): rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
97a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkha
97b1('bum): pa'o ba thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// 
97b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po zhe gsum pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang
97b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags
97b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i da dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag
97b5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston nga dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
97b6('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
97b7('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de
97b8('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
98a1('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
98a2('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
98a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
98a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sam des dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
98a5('bum): gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
98a6('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
98a7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
98a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
98b1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
98b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
98b3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
98b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes dganyen ni gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
98b5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs ngas rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
98b6('bum): de la tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
98b7('bum): 'amang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
98b8('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
99a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
99a2('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
99a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
99a4('bum): pho'i dge ba'i de shes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
99a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tsher bzhi zhes bya bar
99a6('bum): da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
99a7('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
99a8('bum): ma gtog par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
99b1('bum): rnab thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi
99b2('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
99b3('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
99b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ga togs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
99b5('bum): kyisar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tsher ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
99b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
99b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
99b8('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
100a1('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jugs pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
100a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
100a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
100a4('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa da ra/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tsherab mtshan ma med
100a5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ci nga / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
100a6('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
100a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar da mi
100a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngon
100b1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
100b2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
100b3('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
100b4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo/ ngas su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba smo/ na pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
100b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi
100b6('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dgra ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
100b7('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa
100b8('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa smon pa med
101a1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang / 
101a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba
101a3('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
101a4('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba ma dngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kya
101a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mngon par
101a6('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
101a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
101a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med
101b1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
101b2('bum): sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
101b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yosu bsngor mi 'jug
101b4('bum): pa'o// gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs dpa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
101b5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ci
101b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
101b7('bum): la 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
101b8('bum): 'amar rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
102a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor
102a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
102a3('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
102a4('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
102a5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
102a6('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
102a7('bum): par rnga nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lha mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
102a8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mi rtag ces bya bar
102b1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
102b2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
102b3('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
102b4('bum): ni gang de la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs dpa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham das cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
102b5('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
102b6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor
102b7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
102b8('bum): par da nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
103a1('bum): pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus
103a2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
103a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
103a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu ba sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sam
103a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
103a6('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna bang bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
103a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
103a8('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par// 
103b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
103b2('bum): kyang ra rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
103b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor
103b4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge da ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
103b5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs ngas rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 8 ba 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
103b6('bum): chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma/ 
103b7('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
103b8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna ni zhes bya
104a1('bum): par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
104a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
104a3('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
104a4('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
104a5('bum): yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
104a6('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la
104a7('bum): mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
104a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
104b1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snga stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i

104b3('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
104b4('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lA das stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa

104b6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
104b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la
104b8('bum): mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
105a1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su basbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //

105a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang / de la lce mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs dpa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
105a5('bum): kyang nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mtshan ma med ces bya
105a6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
105a7('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
105a8('bum): panyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
105b1('bum): ba shes gnyen ni/  lams spong pa med ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rdzub thams cad tu / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sa
105b2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba smon pa med ces bya bar dmi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chos ston cing / 
105b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mu gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna smon pa med
105b4('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams dang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
105b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// / gang de la lce smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

105b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
105b8('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
106a1('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
106a2('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
106a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

106a6('bum): kyang de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mngon par 'du bya ba med

107a4('bum): pa'ong rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

108b1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
108b2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro bdag med ces bya bar de mi
108b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
108b4('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
108b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs sa rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// ga de la chos bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
108b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
108b7('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // 
108b8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra zhi zhes bya
109a1('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
109a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
109a3('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
109a4('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mgu togs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas/ sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg zhi zhes
109a5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
109a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
109a7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
109a8('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma gtogs par/ 
109b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
109b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
109b3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
109b4('bum): de la ro stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
109b5('bum): kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'ju/ ga pa'o// gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de mi dmig sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
109b6('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos stong zhes bya bar
109b7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
109b8('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar
110a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
110a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
110a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
110a4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ na thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
110a5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang nge ngo mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
110a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
110a7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
110a8('bum): gang de la chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
110b1('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon
110b2('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
110b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
110b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// // gang de la dri smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
110b5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
110b6('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
110b7('bum): paranyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
110b8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos smon pa med ces bya ba
111a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
111a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med
111a3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
111a4('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing nga / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
111a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang / sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
111a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
111a7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
111a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi kho bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
111b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa
111b2('bum): gang de la chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
111b3('bum): par da nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
111b4('bum): ni gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs dpa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams dad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
111b5('bum): par da nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // 
111b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri dben
111b7('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
111b8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro dpan zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
112a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
112a2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
112a3('bum): gang de la chos dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
112a4('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'a 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la
112a5('bum): mig gi rnam par bshes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'ib thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
112a6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
112a7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'an// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// / 
112a8('bum): gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 
112b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
112b2('bum): ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsgor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam
112b3('bum): par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
112b4('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
112b5('bum): cing ra dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
112b6('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
112b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
112b8('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
113a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes/ 
113a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
113a3('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
113a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am8/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// / gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
113a5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
113a6('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
113a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
113a8('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham
113b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi
113b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
113b3('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
113b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag med
113b5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ci/ nga / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams/ cang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
113b6('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
113b7('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes
113b8('bum): pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am// 
114a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po zhe bzhi pa/ rab 'byor
114a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
114a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam
114a4('bum): par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshe// nas ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam/ dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
114a5('bum): kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pazhi zhes bya ba ra de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
114a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam
114a7('bum): par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
114a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
114b1('bum): kyang dernam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya
114b2('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
114b3('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmig
114b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs dpar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
114b5('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam pa ra shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rgyu la gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
114b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya
114b7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
114b8('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
115a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes
115a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
115a3('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
115a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi das 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'judag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
115a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya b.rade mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
115a6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes
115a7('bum): pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
115a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
115b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
115b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
115b3('bum): pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
115b4('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rna rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
115b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams ca/ da kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
115b6('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa med
115b7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
115b8('bum): sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
116a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces
116a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
116a3('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
116a4('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
116a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
116a6('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma
116a7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsnor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i ba
116a8('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
116b1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

116b4('bum): bar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo/ dngasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes dpa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

116b6('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad

117b2('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

117b5('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston/ cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am

118a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes ga/ nyan ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
118a5('bum): cing nga dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi

118a7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

120b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'du sa te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs/ pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

121a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chu
121a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
121a3('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa
121a4('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stonadang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
121a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngod mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de ming mi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
121a6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces
121a7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod
121a8('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
121b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
121b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
121b3('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
121b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cadad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog/ das par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
121b5('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pamangon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
121b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba
121b7('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
121b8('bum): kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
122a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yosu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par/ 
122a2('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
122a3('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
122a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
122a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mid mig sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
122a6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya
122a7('bum): bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
122a8('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
122b1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
122b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
122b3('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
122b4('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus tre reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
122b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis/ 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa 'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
122b6('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
122b7('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces
122b8('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi/ 
123a1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa/ 
123a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya/ 
123a3('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
123a4('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te/ dereg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa rnam
123a5('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sarayongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang la yid kyi 'dus te
123a6('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 
123a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang
123a8('bum): de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
123b1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe rang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de/ 
123b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
123b3('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
123b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
123b5('bum): ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams ca/  kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
123b6('bum): pa rar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
123b7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
123b8('bum): pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
124a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
124a2('bum): chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
124a3('bum): kyang ra rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshem
124a4('bum): babadag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chos cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam dpa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
124a5('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi'o/ jug pa'o// gdade la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las nga ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
124a6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa
124a7('bum): gang de la lho'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

124b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
124b2('bum): paba'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor rab bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams ca/

124b4('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
124b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'a jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
124b6('bum): tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
124b7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
124b8('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor shi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
125a1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
125a2('bum): pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

125a5('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' semasas dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gzhan ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes
125a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
125a7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad

125b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
125b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
125b4('bum): cing radage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
125b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
125b6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i bshes
125b7('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
125b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi

126a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham

126a7('bum): gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
