126b1('bum): gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe rab smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
126b2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
126b3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
126b4('bum): gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa ma/ dad ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
126b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sang sa rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba smon pa med ces
126b6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
126b7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
126b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa
127a1('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
127a2('bum): 'amang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa
127a3('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyirgya ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
127a4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
127a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cadakyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
127a6('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
127a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
127a8('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
127b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
127b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus
127b3('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor rab mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
127b4('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis dar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan ya du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
127b5('bum): ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa la sa byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
127b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe/ 
127b7('bum): ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
127b8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad
128a1('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg
128a2('bum): ba las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
128a3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
128a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhya na pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
128a5('bum): gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang na zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams kyang / rnam pa tham
128a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
128a7('bum): brgya pa// bam po zhe lnga pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi rtag
128a8('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
128b1('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa/ 
128b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag med ces
128b3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
128b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rtenacing 'brel par 'byung ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmi dgas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
128b5('bum): pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya sa kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
128b6('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 
128b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
128b8('bum): cing de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten
129a1('bum): cing 'brel par 'byung ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
129a2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
129a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
129a4('bum): gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben zhes bya ba// rade mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / da/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
129a5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
129a6('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham
129a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
129a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
129b1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtags ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
129b2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
129b3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam
129b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
129b5('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'a// drug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cig
129b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyi na pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sang sa rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan ya/ 
129b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i
129b8('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
130a1('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
130a2('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
130a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha
130a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
130a5('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
130a6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
130a7('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 
130a8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin
130b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
130b2('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
130b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod
130b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs dpa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
130b5('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
130b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor
130b7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
130b8('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes par kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i// 
131a1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sa sa rgyas kyi sar yong
131a2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
131a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor
131a4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
131a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes
131a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
131a7('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
131a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
131b1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi
131b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
131b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba
131b4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
131b5('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i// tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // 
131b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmig/ 
131b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o//

132a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
132a2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab
132a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
132a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzha ngan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge dpa'i bshas gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
132a5('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
132a6('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
132a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu
132a8('bum): phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
132b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
132b2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan

132b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la she ngas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
132b5('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma/ gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya/ sa kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
132b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
132b7('bum): cing de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul
132b8('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 
133a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
133a2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
133a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
133a4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
133a5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngo
133a6('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
133a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
133a8('bum): ba'i bshas gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams
133b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med
133b2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
133b3('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
133b4('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog/ das par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi
133b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
133b6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med
133b7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi/ 
133b8('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
134a1('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
134a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // 
134a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar
134a4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha/ rnams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mgatogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
134a5('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i bar la tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
134a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi
134a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
134a8('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang na zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
134b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
134b2('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab
134b3('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyi mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge/ 
134b4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs rangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
134b5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul rgya/ sa chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par// 
134b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
134b7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
134b8('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
135a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
135a2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid
135a3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
135a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de midamigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
135a5('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dam gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya sa kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
135a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
135a7('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
135a8('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ 
135b1('bum): gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
135b2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
135b3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
135b4('bum): la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de ming dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
135b5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams// cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i// 
135b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bskor
135b7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
135b8('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
136a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
136a2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
136a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
136a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa dab thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
136a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // 
136a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
136a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
136a8('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
136b1('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
136b2('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
136b3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
136b4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dkyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
136b5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhe/ sa bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
136b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
136b7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
136b8('bum): pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
137a1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
137a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
137a3('bum): pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

137a5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ na pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
137a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam

137a8('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor
137b1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
137b2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
137b3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
137b4('bum): la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge/ dba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
137b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
137b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
137b7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

138a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
138a2('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i

138a4('bum): gang de la phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
138a5('bum): paran nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu ba sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
138a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
138a7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
138a8('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
138b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

138b6('bum): pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
138b7('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
138b8('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
139a1('bum): la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
139a2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
139a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa
139a4('bum): nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams bcad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ 
139a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs/ pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
139a6('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar
139a7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor
139a8('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
139b1('bum): parang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
139b2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
139b3('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
139b4('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i dab shes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar
139b5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
139b6('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
139b7('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag

145a8('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshug

145b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
145b3('bum): 'amad rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // 
145b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya
145b5('bum): par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'iHba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
145b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de lang gi mtshan nyid stom nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
145b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
145b8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
146a1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
146a2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
146a3('bum): cing nga dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med
146a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmig/ ngas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
146a5('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu pa sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sa/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
146a6('bum): ni gang de la nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
146a7('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

146b1('bum): stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/

146b3('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
146b4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ra ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dpa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs

146b7('bum): stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis

149b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po de sa shes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran nga nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de ming migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba

149b7('bum): pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos/

151b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kris 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yong su bsngor ma 'jum pa'o// 
151b2('bum): ram tu phyin pa stong drag brgyag/ drug ga ga de la rdzu 'phrul gyi gang pa rnams maudag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis cho
151b3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
151b4('bum): gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
151b5('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
152a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
152a2('bum): sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
152a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi
152a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba tha dmas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
152a5('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de ming migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
152a6('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi
152a7('bum): rkang pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 
152a8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
152b1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
152b2('bum): gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
152b3('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
152b4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan tho/ das kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
152b5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
152b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
152b7('bum): gyis chos skyon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
152b8('bum): pa'o/ gang de la dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
153a1('bum): parang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
153a2('bum): chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
153a3('bum): pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
153a4('bum): paradanyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa der yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang / po rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
153a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha mas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
153a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // 
153a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mngon par
153a8('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
153b1('bum): 'amad rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
153b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmig
153b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
153b4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
153b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs ngas rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
153b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
153b7('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
153b8('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // 
154a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
154a2('bum): de la stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
154a3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
154a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidad ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
154a5('bum): gang de la stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmi sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
154a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
154a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
154a8('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
154b1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
154b2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngod mi 'jug pa
154b3('bum): gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
154b4('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
154b5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa/ ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma/ khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
154b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
154b7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan
154b8('bum): lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
155a1('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
155a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang
155a3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
155a4('bum): par da nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi ya ngan lag rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
155a5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cadakyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mag/ togs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
155a6('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
155a7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan
155a8('bum): lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
155b1('bum): kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
155b2('bum): pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
155b3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
155b4('bum): nyiljid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal
155b5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cingadage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
155b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag
155b7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags
155b8('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
156a1('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
156a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug
156a3('bum): pa'o// dgang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
156a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa
156a5('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
156a6('bum): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul/

156a8('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
156b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmig
156b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
156b3('bum): 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
156b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dad ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
156b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'a phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes dra bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
156b6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i
156b7('bum): bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
156b8('bum): thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
157a1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
157a2('bum): gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
157a3('bum): pamanyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
