157a6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa
157a7('bum): rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
157a8('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
157b1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngod mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags par
157b2('bum): bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
157b3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
157b4('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
157b5('bum): gang de la bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
157b6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
157b7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongasu bsngor mi
157b8('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
158a1('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
158a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
158a3('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
158a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sa dngas rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de ngal bsam gtan rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
158a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
158a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
158a7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan
158a8('bum): rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
158b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
158b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
158b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
158b4('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul dgyes chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
158b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams
158b6('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
158b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
158b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
159a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
159a2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
159a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
159a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog das par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
159a5('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnam sa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de me dmig sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
159a6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams
159a7('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
159a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
159b1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
159b2('bum): pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis// 
159b3('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
159b4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa da thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos da kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
159b5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms para'ajug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
159b6('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
159b7('bum): 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
159b8('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
160a1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
160a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
160a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
160a4('bum): la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
160a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi/ sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'a// jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
160a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
160a7('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 
160a8('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
160b1('bum): gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgoms pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
160b2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
160b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod/ 
160b4('bum): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa/ rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
160b5('bum): kyang nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngo/ ra mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bdag
160b6('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
160b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // 
160b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar
161a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
161a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
161a3('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa
161a4('bum): rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cadad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
161a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
161a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
161a7('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
161a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de
161b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
161b2('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
161b3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i
161b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
161b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang / sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// / gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
161b6('bum): pa dgu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
161b7('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
161b8('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
162a1('bum): de la mthar gyis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
162a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
162a3('bum): dgu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
162a4('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gan das pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // 
162a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ 
162a6('bum): gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
162a7('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i
162a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 
162b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
162b2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
162b3('bum): gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
162b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan da thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i
162b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
162b6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i
162b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
162b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
163a1('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
163a2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
163a3('bum): stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
163a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna dam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma me dad pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
163a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
163a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar 'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon med smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
163a7('bum): cing nga dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam
163a8('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
163b1('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
163b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
163b3('bum): par danyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom
163b4('bum): pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
163b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shwa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
163b6('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa
163b7('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
163b8('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
164a1('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa
164a2('bum): gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
164a3('bum): par danyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
164a4('bum): cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
164a5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams ma tshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i chu la gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
164a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa
164a7('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am// 
164a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
164b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par
164b2('bum): shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
164b3('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
164b4('bum): paba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
164b5('bum): de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmig sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
164b6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
164b7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
164b8('bum): gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par// 
165a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
165a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams
165a3('bum): stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
165a4('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
165a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor// mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa
165a6('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
165a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
165a8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin
165b1('bum): rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa 'a thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
165b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
165b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmig
165b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad/ kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog/ sa par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
165b5('bum): yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnam sa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // 
165b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces
165b7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
165b8('bum): kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
166a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis bum/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar/ 
166a2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
166a3('bum): sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
166a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor/ mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa
166a5('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
166a6('bum): 'amar rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
166a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo
166a8('bum): rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
166b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
166b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
166b3('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
166b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
166b5('bum): bcu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par// 
166b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
166b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
166b8('bum): gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
167a1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya bar de mi
167a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
167a3('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
167a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
167a5('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis// chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
167a6('bum): zos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
167a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
167a8('bum): bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams

167b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa
167b3('bum): gang de la mi 'jigs pa ban mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
167b4('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug dpa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal na/ sa bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

167b6('bum): gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
167b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
167b8('bum): pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams
168a1('bum): stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
168a2('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba

168a4('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos s+ho// na cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
168a5('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
168a6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
168a7('bum): gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
168a8('bum): par na nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
168b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so
168b2('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
168b3('bum): par da nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
168b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ !ngan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi
168b5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rna/ mas bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rgyu/ la gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kya
168b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni
168b7('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
168b8('bum): sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/ stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
169a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/ mtshan ma
169a2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
169a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
169a4('bum): kyang de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig
169a5('bum): pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
169a6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
169a7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug
169a8('bum): pa'od gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma
169b1('bum): banyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sgor
169b2('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying
169b3('bum): rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
169b4('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ 8/ gang de la snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar ded mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
169b5('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ga/ gas par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po
169b6('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
169b7('bum): kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos smon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

170a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya
170a8('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu

170b4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa/

170b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba

171a1('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

171a4('bum): sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi tshe des ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmig/ das pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba

171a6('bum): la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
171a7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ba ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi
171a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
171b1('bum): sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
171b2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
171b3('bum): brgya ga bam po zhe bdun pa/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des
171b4('bum): yongasu zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/ 
171b5('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol
171b6('bum): tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing / thabs mi mkhas te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
171b7('bum): yongasu spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
171b8('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sem
172a1('bum): su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi
172a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ 
172a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing
172a4('bum): dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des slom sem/ sa su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshul khrims
172a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
172a6('bum): bya ba med par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sem su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
172a7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol
172a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
172b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ 
172b2('bum): med par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
172b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi nang stong zhes bya bar de yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
172b4('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang / rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ ngan pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
172b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang / dmigs la/ 
172b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs
172b7('bum): chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
172b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam
173a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
173a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
173a3('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
173a4('bum): par da gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
173a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do// do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi// na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
173a6('bum): gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
173a7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa
173a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
173b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
173b2('bum): gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
173b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
173b4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro// la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
173b5('bum): gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams nga stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang / 
173b6('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs rang gi mtshan
173b7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs de'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
173b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
174a1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
174a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
174a3('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs ngos
174a4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa/ 'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs da la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab
174a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca da mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
174a6('bum): yid la byed do// dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
174a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba nang
174a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
174b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi slong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
174b2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par chor
174b3('bum): ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
174b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba stong / pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
174b5('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
174b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
174b7('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba
174b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
175a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
175a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
175a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
175a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ cho
175a5('bum): ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
175a6('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
175a7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
175a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
175b1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/ 
175b2('bum): la blang med par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed
175b3('bum): do dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la/ 
175b4('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong/ pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rno// ma sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
175b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/ yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid ste/ nga pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
175b6('bum): gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
175b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mi dmigs pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
175b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba
176a1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
176a2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
176a3('bum): der dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
176a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa / tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
176a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyi/ dkyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
176a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
176a7('bum): tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
176a8('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de
176b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes phyi nang spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i/ 
176b2('bum): tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
176b3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
176b4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi dad la bya ba med par/ 'du shes chen po stong pa zhes bya
176b5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
176b6('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
176b7('bum): tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
176b8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byos stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
177a1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes 'dus ma byas
177a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
177a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
177a4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
177a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
177a6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
177a7('bum): par 'du shes dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
177a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
177b1('bum): tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
177b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
177b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes rang gi mtshan
177b4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul dgyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs de la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de
177b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes
177b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 
177b7('bum): tshad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong
177b8('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
178a1('bum): med par/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
178a2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
178a3('bum): byabar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan ya
178a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
178a5('bum): 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmi// gas pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/ la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de
178a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
178a7('bum): ba'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
178a8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi nang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
178b1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du bye stong shid stong pa zhes bya bar
178b2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
178b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
178b4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
178b5('bum): 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kya nga dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
178b6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
178b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
178b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
179a1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das
179a2('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179a3('bum): pal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog/ 
179a4('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
179a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed do// rab med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ nga mi gas pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
179a6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang bzhin
179a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
179a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
179b1('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
179b2('bum): 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
179b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par 'du byed mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
179b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
179b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
179b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
179b7('bum): 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
179b8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
180a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol
180a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
180a3('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam
180a4('bum): par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigangs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ s+ho dang pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
180a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam pa/ ra shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
180a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
180a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
180a8('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes
180b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
180b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
180b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par
180b4('bum): shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa ni da kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// 
180b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bamed par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya
180b6('bum): bar yi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
180b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das
180b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
181a1('bum): 'amed par/ rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
181a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa
181a3('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
181a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / da ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes par rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
181a5('bum): tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
181a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
181a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa
181a8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
181b1('bum): rangs phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngaldan pa'i yid la byang med dang/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi/ 
181b2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
181b3('bum): la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
181b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/ bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
181b5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo ba nyid stong nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms mos su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
181b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
181b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po deshes rab kyi pha rol
181b8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmig
182a1('bum): lang stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig
182a2('bum): phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// 
182a3('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
182a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig
182a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
182a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong
182a7('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
182a8('bum): med par/ mig don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
182b1('bum): kyil sa phyin pa chud pa / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da da nga ldan papa 'ang la byu med par/ mig 'dus byas skyong ba zhes byab med sa byed de/ dmigs pa tshul can 'dus byas/ 
182b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang chom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
182b3('bum): mig 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
182b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa ni yid la bya ba med par/ mig mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
182b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kya rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
182b6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
182b7('bum): kyang chom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
182b8('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams
183a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
183a2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ mig chos
183a3('bum): thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
183a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nga ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mig rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
183a5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
183a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
183a7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
183a8('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
183b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig tsha ma nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo sa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis ca
183b2('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
183b3('bum): par yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rangab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub semaso
183b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba nang spong ba zhes bya bar yid
183b5('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang rngarma gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
183b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
183b7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
183b8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
184a1('bum): pa'i yid la byangab med par na ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
184a2('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid
184a3('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigasol/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ 
184a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chu la gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyi
184a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba 'dus byas
184a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
184a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmig
184a8('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba mtha' las
184b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
184b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
184b3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
184b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba dor ba med pa stong pa/ zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
184b5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba rang bzhin
184b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
