184b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
184b8('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba rang
185a1('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
185a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
185a3('bum): tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
185a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba dngos po me// da pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa/ 'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
185a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba ngo bo nyid
185a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
185a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
185a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
185b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
185b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snga phyi stong pa zhes
185b3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
185b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma dad par sna phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
185b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
185b6('bum): sna stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
185b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong
185b8('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
186a1('bum): med par/ sna don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
186a2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
186a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
186a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna 'dus ma byas stong dpa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul/ dgyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
186a5('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna
186a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo ma sem su byed do// de shes
186a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ smra thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
186a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad
186b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byang med par/ sna dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
186b2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna rang bzhin
186b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
186b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna chos tham das cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
186b5('bum): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
186b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
186b7('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna mi
186b8('bum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyi kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
187a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
187a2('bum): gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
187a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// / 
187a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha ma so cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// sna dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
187a5('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis bya/ nga rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
187a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce nang stong pa zhes
187a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
187a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
187b1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
187b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
187b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
187b4('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce chen po stong pa zhes bya
187b5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
187b6('bum): tshed rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
187b7('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce
187b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
188a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
188a3('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ lce mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
188a4('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidra dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce thog ma dang tha ma
188a5('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa/ 'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang // dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de
188a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
188a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
188a8('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
188b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byung med par/ lce chos thams cad skyong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
188b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
188b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med dar/ lce rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
188b4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma ngan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce mi dmig
188b5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
188b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
188b7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
188b8('bum): ba med par/ lce ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
189a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
189a2('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
189a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus nang stong pa zhes bya bar
189a4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
189a5('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi/ da la bya ba med par/ lus phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid
189a6('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
189a7('bum): par na lus phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
189a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa
189b1('bum): nyid srong di gang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
189b2('bum): par lus chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
189b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
189b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
189b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// 
189b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad med par/ lus 'dus
189b7('bum): ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
189b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
190a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
190a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang
190a3('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus
190a4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chu ngal gyis dor ba med pa stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong dpa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
190a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus ra nga bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs bri
190a6('bum): tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
190a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
190a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus rang gi mtshan nyid stong
190b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
190b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigaso pa
190b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
190b4('bum): bya ba med par/ lus dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar/ yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po dmed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
190b5('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu na ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus nga
190b6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
190b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
190b8('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ga/ 
191a1('bum): bam po zhe brgyad pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
191a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de
191a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
191a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dpa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
191a5('bum): la bya ba med par/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
191a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa
191a7('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyi kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
191a8('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ yid chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
191b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
191b2('bum): tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
191b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
191b4('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid 'dus ma byas
191b5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chu la gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
191b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
191b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
191b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang
192a1('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
192a2('bum): med par/ yid dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
192a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
192a4('bum): gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi sa kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
192a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la byang med par/ yid chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chu/ la gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
192a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid rang gi mtshan nyid stong
192a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
192a8('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa
192b1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
192b2('bum): yid dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
192b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo
192b4('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
192b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
192b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
192b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab
192b8('bum): kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa/ 
193a1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
193a2('bum): bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
193a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong
193a4('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyisakyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
193a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa/ 'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
193a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs don dam
193a7('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
193a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
193b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
193b2('bum): bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
193b3('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
193b4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthada' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ sto/ pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
193b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med paragazugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
193b6('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
193b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs der ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor
193b8('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
194a1('bum): yid la bya med par/ gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
194a2('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong / 
194a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
194a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa/ de'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
194a5('bum): rangagi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
194a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
194a7('bum): lang stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs
194a8('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
194b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
194b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
194b3('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
194b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// na po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
194b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
194b6('bum): lang stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra phyi stong pa zhes bya
194b7('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/  rnam pa
194b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
195a1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra stong pa nyid stong/ 
195a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
195a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
195a4('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lnga ngan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra don dam pa stong pa zhes bya/ 
195a5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
195a6('bum): tsher rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigasol/ 
195a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya
195a8('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
195b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
195b2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra 'o// 
195b3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha/ 
195b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra dor ba/ med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
195b5('bum): tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ ste/ pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
195b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
195b7('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
195b8('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
196a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
196a2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra
196a3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
196a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra dngos po med/ pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
196a5('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
196a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid/ 
196a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
196a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang
196b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri nang stong pa zhes bya ba/ 
196b2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
196b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
196b4('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lnga na pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri phyi nang stong pa zhes
196b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong // pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
196b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
196b7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
196b8('bum): dri chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
197a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
197a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
197a3('bum): bya ba med par/ dri 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
197a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad/ mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri 'dusam byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
197a5('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
197a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
197a7('bum): rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
197a8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
197b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
197b2('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
197b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lo// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
197b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang / 
197b5('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smra/ dpa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la byang med par/ dri rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes
197b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
197b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
197b8('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri dngos po med pa stong
198a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
198a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
198a3('bum): dmigs lo// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri dngos po
198a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ da mi rigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidad kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed/ 
198a5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems drab/ 'chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
198a6('bum): bya ba med par/ ro nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
198a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
198a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ ro phyi nang stong pa zhes
198b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
198b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byang med par/ ro stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
198b3('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
198b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes darab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
198b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ re don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig sa pa'i tshul gyis don dam po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
198b6('bum): 'ad stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan da'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro 'dus byas s+ho
198b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
198b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
199a1('bum): lang stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
199a2('bum): darang ro mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// 
199a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// 
199a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms mas su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
199a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ ro dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar mi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa
199a6('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro/ 
199a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
199a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
199b1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
199b2('bum): la bya ba med par/ ro rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
199b3('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
199b4('bum): ded dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i
199b5('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
199b6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
199b7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ ro ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes
199b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
200a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
200a2('bum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
200a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
200a4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ reg phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
200a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
200a6('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
200a7('bum): la bya ba med par/ reg stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
200a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
200b1('bum): tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
200b2('bum): la bya ba med par/ reg don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
200b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ reg 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
200b4('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
200b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig sa pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
200b6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg mtha' las 'das
200b7('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
200b8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang
201a1('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
201a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
201a3('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
201a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
201a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yi da la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
201a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
201a7('bum): par reg rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
201a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
201b1('bum): / tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
201b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
201b3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
201b4('bum): de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang do mi dgas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye da do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
201b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong / pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
201b6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po de shes rab
201b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos rlung stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang skyong / 
201b8('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
202a1('bum): par chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
202a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
202a3('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
202a4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
202a5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos chen po
202a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
202a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa
202a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang ldan pa'i
202b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ chos 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
202b2('bum): dode shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
202b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
202b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ da dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
202b5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
202b6('bum): med par/ chos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
202b7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
202b8('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
203a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang dmi
203a2('bum): lar stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos chos thams/ 
203a3('bum): cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
203a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lnga ngan ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
203a5('bum): gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ skye/ nga ba nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
203a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
203a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos dngos po med pa stong
203a8('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
203b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
203b2('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos dngos
203b3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
203b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
203b5('bum): la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
203b6('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya
203b7('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
203b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
204a1('bum): lang stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
204a2('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
204a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
204a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
204a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa don dam pa spyong / zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don
204a6('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
204a7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid/ 
204a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes
204b1('bum): pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
204b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
204b3('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
204b4('bum): tsher rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
204b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyangadamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
204b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
204b7('bum): gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
204b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes d+ma rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
205a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
205a2('bum): par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang / 
205a3('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa rang gi mchu
205a4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chu/ la gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/ la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
205a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams da mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmig pa stong pa zhes bya bar
205a6('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
205a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa
205a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
205b1('bum): la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
205b2('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos// 
205b3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
205b4('bum): byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
205b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa/ 'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
205b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba medu par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
205b7('bum): phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
205b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa
206a1('bum): gnyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang rngan
206a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ spong pa nyid
206a3('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
206a4('bum): chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs dpa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
206a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong
206a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
206a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
206a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
206b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmig
206b2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par
206b3('bum): shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su// 
206b4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/ la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang
206b5('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmi sa pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
206b6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa
206b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
206b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i/ 
207a1('bum): tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rangab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
207a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
207a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
207a4('bum): bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
207a5('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de nis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
207a6('bum): ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
207a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par
207a8('bum): shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
207b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
207b2('bum): de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
207b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
207b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi nga dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem sa su byed do// 
207b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po ni dgu pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha
207b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
207b7('bum): ba'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
207b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
208a1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam
208a2('bum): par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
208a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
208a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
208a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
208a6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
208a7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
208a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par
208b1('bum): shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes ra
208b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
208b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
208b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das
208b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo/ ma sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu// phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
208b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid le byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa
208b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
208b8('bum): la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
209a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
209a2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
209a3('bum): do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya
209a4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos tham das cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi das kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
209a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna/ rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya
209a6('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
209a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
209a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmig pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
209b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa
209b2('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
209b3('bum): bamed par/ sgra'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms ma
209b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos
209b5('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i rngo na/ nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
209b6('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/  rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
209b7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lha'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
209b8('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi
210a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
210a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
210a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
210a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid dal byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong
