235b6('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
235b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
235b8('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang
236a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byang med pa
236a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
236a3('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa
236a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
236a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
236a6('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
236a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
236a8('bum): gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
236b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong ba nyid
236b2('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
236b3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
236b4('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ngan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
236b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
236b6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma
236b7('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
236b8('bum): la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la/ 
237a1('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
237a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
237a3('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
237a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor rab dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
237a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
237a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
237a7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
237a8('bum): lus kyis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
237b1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
237b2('bum): gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
237b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya
237b4('bum): bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs dpa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
237b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pan/ rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
237b6('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
237b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigaso pa'i tshul gyis ngo
237b8('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
238a1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor da dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
238a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes
238a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya
238a4('bum): par yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong dpa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo/ ma sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
238a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lA na pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsho rab phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
238a6('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
238a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid/ 
238a8('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
238b1('bum): med pang / yid kyi 'dus te ga pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang
238b2('bum): rlotshom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
238b3('bum): tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
238b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen thos tsher don dam pa stong pa zhes
238b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don ma pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi/ sa kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
238b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
238b7('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
238b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
239a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
239a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 
239a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
239a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te re dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba theg ma dang tha ma med pa stongadapa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
239a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de na/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
239a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
239a7('bum): gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
239a8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
239b1('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid
239b2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
239b3('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
239b4('bum): tsher ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la dad de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
239b5('bum): rlomasemasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa / spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
239b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
239b7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos
239b8('bum): po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
240a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
240a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
240a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
240a4('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang da migs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// // shes rab kyi
240a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nga gcig pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol
240a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
240a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ 
240a8('bum): med par/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi/ 
240b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams phyin stong ba zhes bya bar yid la rnyed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
240b2('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
240b3('bum): bya ba med par/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes
240b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ru/ sa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
240b5('bum): der dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmi gsal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed/ do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
240b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa
240b7('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ 
240b8('bum): med par/ sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
241a1('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong
241a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
241a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
241a4('bum): gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/  stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
241a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med parags 'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma
241a6('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
241a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
241a8('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya
241b1('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
241b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
241b3('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
241b4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid/ stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa/ 'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmig
241b5('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
241b6('bum): med par/ sa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
241b7('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
241b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
242a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid
242a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
242a3('bum): med par/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
242a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byangang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes ra rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad// 
242a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'ikhams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmi gas pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
242a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams phyi stong pa
242a7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa/ 
242a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
242b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa
242b2('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
242b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong po nyid kyang dmigs la
242b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi de pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
242b5('bum): chu'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid ngadamigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems bye'o// 
242b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// 
242b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
242b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus mo byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
243a1('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
243a2('bum): chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// 
243a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
243a4('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha mam/ du pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi ras kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
243a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams/ dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
243a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
243a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
243a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams chos thams ca
243b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
243b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi
243b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
243b4('bum): bya ba med par/ chu'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya ba dar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming mi dgas pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
243b5('bum): rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa
243b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
243b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid
243b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
244a1('bum): ba med par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
244a2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
244a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
244a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye ngan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams
244a5('bum): phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
244a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
244a7('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams
244a8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
244b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
244b2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i kham
244b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
244b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
244b5('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa/ nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi/ rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
244b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
244b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams mtha' las 'das pa
244b8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
245a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa
245a2('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
245a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ma'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
245a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni ngang dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams rang
245a5('bum): bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab
245a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
245a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
245a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
245b1('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i
245b2('bum): khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
245b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// 
245b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kya dang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
245b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ ba med par/ ma'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba ra yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong
245b6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
245b7('bum): ma'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
245b8('bum): sem su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/ 
246a1('bum): la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
246a2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams phyi stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
246a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
246a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
246a5('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams stong pa
246a6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
246a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
246a8('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi
246b1('bum): khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
246b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
246b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
246b4('bum): rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus mo byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
246b5('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams mtha' las 'das pa
246b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
246b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
246b8('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad
247a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad med par/ rlung gi khams do rab med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong/ 
247a2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
247a3('bum): ba med par/ rlung gi khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
247a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pade'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams chos thams
247a5('bum): cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa 'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes
247a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// 
247a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
247a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
247b1('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung
247b2('bum): gi khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
247b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
247b4('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi ngas kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
247b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
247b6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
247b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
247b8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams phyi stong pa
248a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
248a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
248a3('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams
248a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa nga'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
248a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha 'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
248a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
248a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
248a8('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams 'dus
248b1('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
248b2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
248b3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
248b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams mtha' langs 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ nga midagos pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
248b5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / rna ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
248b6('bum): bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// 
248b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i
248b8('bum): khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de
249a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad med dar / na mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya
249a2('bum): par yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lo// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
249a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
249a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha pharol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
249a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yi// de la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
249a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
249a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
249a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams
249b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis snang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi
249b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
249b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
249b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na mkha'i kham sa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bayid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
249b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de
249b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
249b7('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
249b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
250a1('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
250a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
250a3('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa
250a4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rgyu dal gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong/ rab nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
250a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
250a6('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
250a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa
250a8('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
250b1('bum): par rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
250b2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya
250b3('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
250b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mi dad par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las 'das dpa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
250b5('bum): gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
250b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
250b7('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
250b8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
251a1('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhin stong / 
251a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
251a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
251a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom de sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyo dad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
251a5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/  migs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
251a6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam
251a7('bum): par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
251a8('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya
251b1('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
251b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
251b3('bum): kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
251b4('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
251b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor pa/ zhen yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
251b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
251b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa phyi stong
251b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
252a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid
252a2('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma
252a3('bum): rig pa stong nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
252a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye dran pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma ri dag pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
252a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ skong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
252a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
252a7('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig
252a8('bum): pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
252b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
252b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
252b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
252b4('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ 
252b5('bum): ba med par/ ma rig pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa na sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
252b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa dor ba med
252b7('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
252b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin
253a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
253a2('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
253a3('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya
253a4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gimatshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi ngas kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
253a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa mi// dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
253a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
253a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med po steng nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
253a8('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
253b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
253b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
253b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
253b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pada'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhesabya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong
253b5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
253b6('bum): la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab
253b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
253b8('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
254a1('bum): 'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
254a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa
254a3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
254a4('bum): 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ da mi dgas pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang da dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
254a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
254a6('bum): ba'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
254a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
254a8('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya
254b1('bum): par yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
254b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog mo dang tha
254b3('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
254b4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes dbya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor da ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
254b5('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang
254b6('bum): bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
254b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
254b8('bum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
255a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
255a2('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
255a3('bum): 'du byed mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
255a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnamadapa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ dab med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
255a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po ni/ da pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
255a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong
255a7('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
255a8('bum): med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
255b1('bum): rlom sems byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
255b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
255b3('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
255b4('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang da mi dgas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
255b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa 8/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
255b6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
255b7('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes
255b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i
256a1('bum): tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
256a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
256a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa
256a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i da tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab
256a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
256a6('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
256a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las
256a8('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
256b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
256b2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dor ba/ 
256b3('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
256b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes/ pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
256b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ s+ho/ nga pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
256b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
256b7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
256b8('bum): med par/ rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
257a1('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mi
257a2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi/ 
257a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
257a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang // dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems/ su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
257a5('bum): che rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
257a6('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
257a7('bum): med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
257a8('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
257b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
257b2('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid/ 
257b3('bum): la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
257b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
257b5('bum): dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do//  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
257b6('bum): bamed par/ ming dang gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
257b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
257b8('bum): de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po spong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
258a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs don dam pa stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang / 
258a2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming
258a3('bum): dang gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab
258a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba med par/ da ming dang gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
258a5('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ma sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
258a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
258a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
258a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med
258b1('bum): pabastong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
258b2('bum): par ming dang gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed
258b3('bum): do de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
258b4('bum): de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang da mi gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
258b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ med par/ ming dang gzugs chos thams cad ste/ nga ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
258b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
258b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
258b8('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming
259a1('bum): dang gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis ca
259a2('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes
259a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
259a4('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhe ra sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo
259a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo/ ma semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
259a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
259a7('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po nga gnyis pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang
259a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug/ 
259b1('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
259b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
259b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug phyi nang
259b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
259b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
259b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid rjes kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
259b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
259b8('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar/ 
260a1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
260a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
260a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
260a4('bum): la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
260a5('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye
260a6('bum): mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su
260a7('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes
260a8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
260b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
260b2('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
260b3('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
260b4('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro/ da pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lban pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chos
260b5('bum): thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kya/ dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
260b6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
260b7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
260b8('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmig// 
261a1('bum): bstod pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang rngan
261a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
261a3('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid
261a4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byud de/ dmigs pa'i chu ral gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ ste/ dad pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab
261a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
261a6('bum): bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
261a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
