261a8('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
261b1('bum): panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
261b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
261b3('bum): gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
261b4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis s+ho/ dang pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
261b5('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chen
261b6('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
261b7('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid
261b8('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg
262a1('bum): pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab
262a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
262a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
262a4('bum): la bya ba med par/ reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhe/ das bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma tha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
262a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa thog ma
262a6('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes
262a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
262a8('bum): tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
262b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
262b2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
262b3('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
262b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bya dad de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong
262b5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
262b6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
262b7('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
262b8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
263a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
263a2('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po
263a3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed// ra
263a4('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ 
263a5('bum): ba med par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab
263a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi// 
263a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
263a8('bum): pabar tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
263b1('bum): la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byang med par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
263b2('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
263b3('bum): tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
263b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dad dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
263b5('bum): tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
263b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
263b7('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa
263b8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
264a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
264a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams// 
264a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa/ 
264a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms/ ma su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
264a5('bum): yid la bya ba med par tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis
264a6('bum): kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes
264a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
264a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ 
264b1('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
264b2('bum): tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
264b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
264b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
264b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba me da par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya ba/ ra yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med/ 
264b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo mu sem su byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya// 
264b7('bum): ba med par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab
264b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// 
265a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
265a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar
265a3('bum): yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
265a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chural gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs ga/ tong nyid kyis kya ni sems byed/ 
265a5('bum): shwa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa/ 8/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs
265a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bye'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
265a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
265a8('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// 
265b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
265b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
265b3('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
265b4('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong po denyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
265b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidal bya ba med par/ sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya/ bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma
265b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
265b7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
265b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
266a1('bum): sred pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
266a2('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya// 
266a3('bum): bar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
266a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med/ dpar/ sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye/ dud/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
266a5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam/ pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
266a6('bum): med par/ sred pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de
266a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
266a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
266b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
266b2('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad med par/ sred pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya
266b3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
266b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa dar/ sred pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
266b5('bum): lnga stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
266b6('bum): sred pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
266b7('bum): semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
266b8('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ len pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab / 
267a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
267a2('bum): tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
267a3('bum): la bya ba med par/ len pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab
267a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye ngan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
267a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
267a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang / 
267a7('bum): rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
267a8('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
267b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
267b2('bum): rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya ba
267b3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
267b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba me dad par/ len pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'dra
267b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
267b6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ len pa theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma medo pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
267b7('bum): semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
267b8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
268a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
268a2('bum): kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa chos thams cad stong ba zhes bya ba
268a3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
268a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya rab med par/ len pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya ba/ dar yid la byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid
268a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bye do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smra/ da pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
268a6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ len pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
268a7('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
268a8('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
268b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
268b2('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po med pa'i ngo
268b3('bum): bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab
268b4('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 'chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro// da pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
268b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
268b6('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar
268b7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
268b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
269a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa
269a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
269a3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po
269a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom samasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi
269a5('bum): la bya ba med par/ srid pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yi/ de la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa smra/ nga pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
269a6('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
269a7('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
269a8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
269b1('bum): dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa
269b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
269b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
269b4('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
269b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dor ba med pa stongapa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
269b6('bum): gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
269b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
269b8('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes
270a1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
270a2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
270a3('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
270a4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
270a5('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dngos po
270a6('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
270a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa
270a8('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa/ 
270b1('bum): srid pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed// 
270b2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
270b3('bum): par skye ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
270b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yi dral byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
270b5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
270b6('bum): bya ba med par/ slu ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs le/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
270b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong
270b8('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
271a1('bum): la bya ba med par/ skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
271a2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
271a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
271a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i da tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
271a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
271a6('bum): skye ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bya'o// de shes rab
271a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
271a8('bum): nga'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
271b1('bum): panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
271b2('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dor ba med
271b3('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
271b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lba ngan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang bzhin s+ho// dang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
271b5('bum): gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
271b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
271b7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong/ 
271b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
272a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi
272a2('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
272a3('bum): la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su
272a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
272a5('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang / dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bye'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
272a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
272a7('bum): panyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
272a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
272b1('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu bye'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
272b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byeda'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
272b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su bye'o// / 
272b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma dad par/ rga shi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// / 
272b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang da migs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed/ do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
272b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// 
272b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi don dam pa
272b8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal
273a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
273a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/ 
273a3('bum): la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su
273a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya
273a5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' la/ sa 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
273a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
273a7('bum): gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
273a8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
273b1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad med par/ rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes
273b2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
273b3('bum): tshad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
273b4('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
273b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid/ stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i/ tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
273b6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mi
273b7('bum): dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// da shes rab
273b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// 
274a1('bum): dmigs pa'i chul gyis dngos pa med pastong banyid bang dmyigs pa// slong pa nyid kyis snang tsam sems byed do// de shes rabs rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 
274a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rgashingo bo nyid skyong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
274a3('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po
274a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmi dgas pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
274a5('bum): byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
274a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag gis
274a7('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom
274a8('bum): steng dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang dmigs la/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
274b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 
274b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
274b3('bum): dbang po rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang dmigs la/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
274b4('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi/ da la bya ba med par/ stobs rnams bsgom ste/ dmig nges pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/ 
274b5('bum): stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
274b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmigs la/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
274b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i
274b8('bum): tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
275a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul
275a2('bum): gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
275a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de dag kyang dmigs la/ bsam gtan de dag gis
275a4('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ ngan pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshad med pa
275a5('bum): rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ tshad med pa de dag gis kya nga rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
275a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul
275a7('bum): gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
275a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de
275b1('bum): dag kyang dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
275b2('bum): bya ba med par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs
275b3('bum): la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
275b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar
275b5('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med ba de dag kyang dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ nga pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
275b6('bum): de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mngon par shes pa
275b7('bum): rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
275b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmig
276a1('bum): la ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
276a2('bum): bya ba med par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sam su byed// de shes rab kyi
276a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul
276a4('bum): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmig/ sa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang rlom// semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
276a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mi 'jigs pa rnams pa sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa de
276a6('bum): dag kyang dmigs la/ mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
276a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ so so yang dag par
276a8('bum): rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snying rje
276b1('bum): chen po bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de dag kyang dmigs la/ snying rje chen po de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
276b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
276b3('bum): pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ 
276b4('bum): bam po nga gsum pa// byang chub sems dpa' semadas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni/ shes
276b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
276b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs pos yongasu zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i
276b7('bum): grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni shes rab kyi
276b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing bzlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing bzlog par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi
277a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing bzlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing bzlog par byed pa'o// tshul
277a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing bzlog par byed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing bzlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin
277a3('bum): gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi// 
277a4('bum): bya'o// bzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag parami bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yi dad la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o/ 
277a5('bum): zhes zer ba 'di ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sa/ mas dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
277a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha bya du byas pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas pha rol tu phyin
277a7('bum): pa drug las bzlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod
277a8('bum): la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms
277b1('bum): pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni rab 'byor byang chub sems
277b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277b3('bum): chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / che du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / 
277b4('bum): skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la ba dab pa bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed// / 
277b5('bum): gsal bar byed do// yongasu ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las/ 
277b6('bum): su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ sangs rgyas kyi cha bya du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs/ 
277b7('bum): kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs
277b8('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// 
278a1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs
278a2('bum): kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam
278a3('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 
278a4('bum): ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg ni bdag gam pad ngag gis stong ngo // chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong po mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis sto// 
278a5('bum): ngosarna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdug gam bdag gis stongasna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong / ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag
278a6('bum): gis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam
278a7('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lha'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis
278a8('bum): stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni
278b1('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis
278b2('bum): stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te
278b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ma'i khams ni bdag
278b4('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bad dag gis stong ngo // na mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdagagis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag
278b5('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // ma rigs pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis
278b6('bum): stong ngo // ming dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stongango // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag
278b7('bum): gis stongo // sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // len pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // srid pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rga shi ni
278b8('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu
279a1('bum): smin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam
279a2('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi
279a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid
279a4('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stongarapa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mtha' las
279a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam
279a6('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag
279a7('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag
279a8('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par
279b1('bum): spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni bdag
279b2('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags
279b3('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i
279b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ 
279b5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgostong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa ma/  pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mngon par shes
279b6('bum): pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
279b7('bum): stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 
279b8('bum): byams pa chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // da
280a1('bum): ltar bdag dang bdag gis stong na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi
280a2('bum): smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing byang
280a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis
280a4('bum): stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos shas/ bya ba yang med do// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub
280a5('bum): phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang stang dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams/ 
280a6('bum): kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med/ nyan thos shes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi
280a7('bum): smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byadu byas
280a8('bum): shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
280b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems shing / rjesu ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig
280b2('bum): par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i
280b3('bum): spyod pa las bzlog cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor
280b4('bum): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 
280b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'pha gas pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad mod pa rnams la
280b6('bum): sbyor ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyos gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba
280b7('bum): dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongasu bsgoms la nyan thos kyi sa mngon du gyis/ 
280b8('bum): shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig byo zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
281a1('bum): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pa dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
281a2('bum): chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor
281a3('bum): ban 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
281a4('bum): mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig zer ba
281a5('bum): de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
281a6('bum): bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston
281a7('bum): pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par
281a8('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar/ 
281b1('bum): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
281b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya
281b3('bum): ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa/ 
281b4('bum): dang 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis s+ho/ ngan pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / dbadag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba
281b5('bum): dang mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dgra na zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang // 
281b6('bum): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang
281b7('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / 
281b8('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya/ 
282a1('bum): ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnab mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
282a2('bum): ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sna mi rtag ces bya ba dang
